title: Saint-Barnabé-Sud
text:
Saint-Barnabé-Sud is a municipality in southwestern <a href="Quebec">Quebec</a> in the <a href="Les%20Maskoutains%20Regional%20County%20Municipality">Regional County Municipality of Les Maskoutains</a>. The population as of the <a href="2011%20Canadian%20Census">2011 Canadian Census</a> was 859. It is the birthplace of historian <a href="Jean-Baptiste-Arthur%20Allaire">Jean-Baptiste-Arthur Allaire</a>.
Death of infant, 2010.
On June 7, 2010, police reported that a 20-day-old infant in Saint-Barnabé-Sud had been killed by a dog, a <a href="Siberian%20Husky">Siberian Husky</a>, that afternoon.
